channel.title: CVE Feed for Ginger Plugins -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ginger Plugins -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-51361|2023-12-29T11:01:29.682Z -- ginger%20plugins -- sticky%20chat%20widget%3A%20click%20to%20chat%2C%20sms%2C%20email%2C%20messages%2C%20call%20button%2C%20live%20chat%20and%20live%20support%20button
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Ginger Plugins Sticky Chat Widget: Click to chat, SMS, Email, Messages, Call Button, Live Chat and Live Support Button allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Sticky Chat Widget: Click to chat, SMS, Email, Messages, Call Button, Live Chat and Live Support Button: from n/a through 1.1.8.
